Reviews.Title: “Very good location, average hotel”
Reviews.Author: Watermelon25
Reviews.Content: spent 3 nights boyfriend overall am satisfied clean cleaner twin beds dont leave window night thousands mosquitos attack location hotel dodgy supposedly begins experienced dangerous scary underground station 3 minutes walk attractions reached walking breakfast included price wasnt decent filling

Reviews.Title: “A Great Stay in Barcelona...Great Price too”
Reviews.Author: Riffmontero
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel power failure check staffs polite helpful trying entertain guests technicians compensation free upgrades transferred penthouse suites modern location walking distance metro la ramblas beach overall amazing time barcelona day tour city comforting night sleep cozy highly recommend fixed budget money worth

Reviews.Title: “Great location, shoddy service”
Reviews.Author: MasJay
Reviews.Content: hotel located la ramblas barcelona minute walking drassanes metro station means youre conveniently placed touristic barcelona hotel expensive quality service reservation bookingcom arrived concierge looked reservation yes ofcourse booked 2 days ago looked list eventually realized indeed reservation 10 minutes superior sounded news pretty excited lift 6th floor 610 average dont believe call superior understand superior relative term radiator bathroom extremely noisy decided shut bathroom door surprise door locked called reception guy appeared straightened paper clip door dont close bathroom door uhhh okay breakfast decent included 2 types cereals cured meats orange juice baguettes spanish tortillas coffee butter jam etc tea previous night left cups tidied cups washed cups wouldve preferred left towels clean towel hole bedsheets clean beds didnt quilt cover quilt weird stain wifi fast signal apparently guarantee common officially inroom wifi didnt tv lamp didnt power switch didnt plugged checkout reception desk liked stay

Reviews.Title: “Convenient to Las Ramblas”
Reviews.Author: STraveler_11
Reviews.Content: block las ramblas clean light airy twin bed added third person left plenty balcony larger expected tablechairs lounge chairs sized bathroom excellent water pressure hot water walkin shower breakfast buffet selection fresh breads fruit front desk staff friendly helpful
